sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get account balances"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/receiver/data/v2/accounts/balances/{consentPactualId}/{accountId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint that our client must call to get the information from Open Finance:
    
* Open Finance endpoint that will be requested: ```(GET /accounts/{accountId}/balances)```
    
* FamilyType: ```Contas``` 
    
The response content provided by this endpoint uses the same entity as the provided on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/578584735/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Contas+-+v2.4.1).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","description":"Identificador da conta de depósito à vista, de poupança ou de pagamento pré-paga.","schema":{"maxLength":100,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\\-]{0,99}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
